content.first: Welcome to Nature & Chill Woodhouses, a refuge of tranquility located in the picturesque northwest of Hungary, in Balf. Our luxury log cabin offers a unique combination of elegance and comfort.
content.second: Established in 2023, our mission has always been to provide a peaceful sanctuary from the chaos of everyday life. With our premium services, such as private saunas and jacuzzis, and our commitment to sustainable luxury, we have truly created a one-of-a-kind retreat experience.
content.third: Immerse yourself in nature and serenity while enjoying the comfort of a luxury house. Experience the unique charm of log cabins, the tranquility of the surrounding green areas, and our services designed to make your stay memorable.

q1.title: What payment methods do you accept?
q1.answer: We accept various payment methods for the convenience of our guests. These include the most popular card types such as Visa, Mastercard, and American Express, as well as electronic payment methods such as PayPal. If you prefer to pay in person, we also accept cash.

q2.title: Is there a cancellation fee if I can't use the reservation?
q2.answer: Cancellation fees depend on the number of days since the booking. Cancellation is free up to 30 days before arrival, from 1 to 29 days before arrival the cancellation fee is 50% of the booking fee, on the day of arrival or after, the fee is 100% of the booking fee.

q3.title: Is there a discount for staying longer?
q3.answer: Yes, we provide discounts for longer stays. If you stay longer than a week, we provide a 10% discount on the total fee. If you stay longer than a month with us, we provide a 15% discount.

q4.title: Do you deliver breakfast to the room?
q4.answer: Yes, our services include room service. Breakfast is usually delivered between 7:45 and 8:15 AM, but please notify us in advance if you have any food allergies.

q5.title: Do you accept pets?
q5.answer: Of course! Our log cabin is dog-friendly, we also welcome pets. Please notify us in advance if you are bringing a pet so we can prepare for its arrival.
